Description.div:
A subset of SNOMED-CT intended for use in the UK, that describes a finding.
Any code from the SNOMED CT UK Fidning subset with original subset original id 9811000000136.
The use of this subset is Advisory as defined in latest version of "NPFIT-ELIBR-AREL-P1R2-0178 Technical Guidance for Implementation of Templated CDA Domains."Â
